description:
test/run: handle compiledir and errorcheckdir with multi-file packages

Multiple files with the same package all get compiled together.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go/

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com, iant@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

Please take another look.

Does this CL require https://codereview.appspot.com/7035043/ for the
change to test/run.go ?

On Mon, Dec 31, 2012 at 8:08 AM,  <iant@golang.org> wrote:
> LGTM
>
> https://codereview.appspot.com/7005053/

On Sun, Dec 30, 2012 at 4:50 PM, Dave Cheney <dave@cheney.net> wrote:

> Does this CL require https://codereview.appspot.com/7035043/ for the
> change to test/run.go ?
>

No, the syntax here works with both.
You've always been able to say -D foo instead of -Dfoo and the same for -I.

Russ

Excellent.
On 31 Dec 2012 23:43, "Russ Cox" <rsc@golang.org> wrote:

> On Sun, Dec 30, 2012 at 4:50 PM, Dave Cheney <dave@cheney.net> wrote:
>
>> Does this CL require https://codereview.appspot.com/7035043/ for the
>> change to test/run.go ?
>>
>
> No, the syntax here works with both.
> You've always been able to say -D foo instead of -Dfoo and the same for -I.
>
> Russ
>

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=a37b3533f9bb ***

test/run: handle compiledir and errorcheckdir with multi-file packages

Multiple files with the same package all get compiled together.

R=golang-dev, iant, dave
CC=golang-dev
https://codereview.appspot.com/7005053
